name: Slime Warrior
description:
The Gameplay
Let's get some slimes!

Limited movement.


Sometimes the door will need keys.


Think carefully about every step until you reach the door.



Features:
♦ 3 Worlds with unique environments
♦ 40 hand-craft levels
♦ Difficulty progression for a growing challenge over the levels
♦ Beautiful pixel art
♦ A lot of slimes to slay!
